doc.field: Series XVII: The Poly Prep and Polyglot
Series XVII: The Poly Prep and Polyglot

Poly Prep and Polyglot are publications of Poly Prep Country Day School after Brooklyn Collegiate and Polytechnic Institute separated into two schools. Poly Prep moved to Bay Ridge and continued on as a prep school for boys, whereas the collegiate part of the institution became Brooklyn Polytechnic Institute, the precursor to today's NYU Polytechnic School of Engineering.
